title: Blood Red Throne - Monument of Death (2001)
description:
Another awesome album by Blood Red Throne.  If you&#039;ve liked them so far, you&#039;ll love this.

Blood Red Throne

Monument of Death - (2001)

1. Portrait of a Killer
2. Souls of Damnation
3. The Children Shall Endure
4. Dream Controlled Murder
5. Mary Whispers Death
6. Ravenous War Machine
7. Malignant Nothingness
8. Monument of Death
9. Path of Flesh



Don&#039;t forget to Seed.
